body:
* Correspond to `aarch64` architecture based on the following URL information.
   URL: https://github.com/BenLangmead/bowtie/pull/13
* Fix bug about 'narrowing error'.
```error: constant expression evaluates to -1 which cannot be narrowed to type 'char' [-Wc++11-narrowing]```
title: bowtie: fix for aarch64, and bugfix about c++11-narrowing.
